Krenaht:
The greatest change is that we have discovered that the emperor and queen of the Giants' Empire, who we thought had died so long ago that nobody even remembers anymore, are still alive. Them, and the Sage Mimir.
To take on the emperor and his queen, we'll need to prepare more than we've ever dreamed of. But the level of skill you have currently allows you to carry out the task of rooting out the Giants in the Giant's Cave.
